full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Tender Information

* **Title:** Acquisition of an Automatic Bagging Machine
* **Reference Number:** WS4529068847-Doc4589829262
* **Publication Date:** June 5, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** June 20, 2024 2:00 PM EDT

### Procurement Details

The Procurement is for the acquisition of one (1) Automatic Bagging Machine, including delivery, installation, training, and maintenance, located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

### Procurement Method

* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Application and Bid Submissions

* **Application Contact Information:** Annie Blanchet, [annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19924403?extsite=MTk5MjQ0MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19924403?extsite=MTk5MjQ0MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Annexes

Refer to Annex Statement of Requirement for detailed specifications and requirements.

Note for formatting, I made sure there are clear headings and break the content into clear sections. Let me know if you have any other questions or if there is anything else I can do for you! 

And I would be happy to help with other tasks or questions you may have. Just let me know! 

Best regards
